cookieConsent.title: About Cookie Usage
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, including basic functions like saving your invitation code. Continuing to use this website indicates your consent to our use of cookies.
cookieConsent.details: We only use necessary functional cookies (such as invitation code linking), and do not collect or share your personal information for advertising or tracking purposes. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings at any time.
